name: Evil Dead: The Game
summary: The game loosely follows the plot of the 1981 film The Evil Dead. You play as Ash Williams as he fights for his life against hoards of Deadites in both the Cabin itself and the woods surrounding it. Over the course of 30 levels, Ash can use the Chainsaw, Boomstick, and an axe to fight through the Deadites and save his friends.
